an4.37:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo parihanaya nibbanasseva santike.
an4.37:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silasampanno hoti, indriyesu guttadvaro hoti, bhojane mattannu hoti, jagariyam anuyutto hoti.
an4.37:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an4.37:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silasampanno hoti.
an4.37:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaro hoti?
an4.37:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
an4.37:3.3: Yatvadhikaranamenam cakkhundriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriyam; cakkhundriye samvaram apajjati.
an4.37:3.8: manasa dhammam vinnaya na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
an4.37:3.9: Yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati; rakkhati manindriyam; manindriye samvaram apajjati.
an4.37:3.10: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaro hoti.
an4.37:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattannu hoti?
an4.37:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patisankha yoniso aharam ahareti:
an4.37:4.3: ‘neva davaya na madaya na mandanaya na vibhusanaya; yavadeva imassa kayassa thitiya yapanaya vihimsuparatiya brahmacariyanuggahaya. Iti purananca vedanam patihankhami, navanca vedanam na uppadessami, yatra ca me bhavissati, anavajjata ca phasuviharo ca’ti.
an4.37:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattannu hoti.
an4.37:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jagariyam anuyutto hoti?
an4.37:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divasam cankamena nisajjaya avaraniyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti;
an4.37:5.3: rattiya pathamam yamam cankamena nisajjaya avaraniyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti;
an4.37:5.4: rattiya majjhimam yamam dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappeti, pade padam accadhaya, sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva;
an4.37:5.5: rattiya pacchimam yamam paccutthaya cankamena nisajjaya avaraniyehi dhammehi cittam parisodheti.
an4.37:5.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jagariyam anuyutto hoti.
an4.37:5.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo parihanaya, nibbanasseva santiketi.
